column1: Art Institute of Chicago////What a special place.  No visit to Chicago is complete without touring this amazing museum. My 3rd time here
column2: each visit outstanding.  Every square inch is covered with art; from three dimensional
column4: photographs-everything.  We are blessed to have this museum as part of our nation's fabric. Honestly
column5: the best $29 ever spent each of the 3 times paid!
